home.title: Used Agricultural Equipment Marketplace
home.description: EquipTrade - Buy and sell used agricultural and industrial equipment. Thousands of tractors, harvesters, and machinery from verified professional sellers.

about.title: About Us
about.description: Discover EquipTrade, the leading marketplace for used agricultural equipment in Europe. Our mission, values, and community of over 5,000 professionals.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Learn how to buy or sell agricultural equipment on EquipTrade. Simple 4-step process: search, contact, negotiate, and finalize your transaction.

listingDetail.title: Agricultural Equipment for Sale
listingDetail.description: View detailed information about this agricultural equipment listing on EquipTrade. Contact the seller directly for more information.

about.title: About EquipTrade
about.intro1: EquipTrade is the leading marketplace for buying and selling used agricultural and industrial equipment in Europe. Since our creation, we connect thousands of professionals to facilitate their transactions.
about.intro2: Our mission is simple: to offer a reliable, transparent and efficient platform to help farmers, dealers and companies find the equipment they need at the best price.
about.trustDesc: All our sellers are verified and every listing is checked to ensure your safety.
about.communityDesc: More than 5,000 agricultural professionals trust us every day.
about.serviceDesc: Personalized support to facilitate your transactions from A to Z.
about.qualityDesc: A rigorous selection of equipment to meet professional requirements.
about.joinDesc: More than 1,000 listings published every month by verified professionals.

howItWorks.title: How does it work?
howItWorks.subtitle: Buying or selling agricultural equipment has never been easier
howItWorks.step1Desc: Browse our catalog of thousands of agricultural and industrial machines. Use filters to refine your search by category, brand, price or location.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Interested in a listing? Contact the seller directly via our secure form. Ask your questions and request additional information.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Exchange with the seller to agree on the price and terms. Arrange a visit to inspect the equipment before purchase.
howItWorks.step4Desc: Complete the transaction directly with the seller. We support you to ensure a smooth buying experience.
howItWorks.sellerDesc: Post your listings for free and reach thousands of potential buyers. Our team verifies each listing to ensure the quality of our platform.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Quickly find answers to your questions
faq.q1: How do I post a listing?
faq.a1: To post a listing, you must first create a seller account. Once logged in, click on "Post an ad" and fill in the form with your equipment details. Add quality photos to increase your chances of sale.
faq.a2: Yes, posting basic listings is completely free. We also offer premium options to highlight your listings and reach more potential buyers.
faq.q3: How do I contact a seller?
faq.a3: Each listing has a contact form. Fill in your details and message, and the seller will receive your request directly by email. You can also call directly if the number is displayed.
faq.a4: We verify the identity of all professional sellers. Listings are also checked before publication to ensure compliance with our terms of use.
faq.a5: The warranty depends on the seller and the type of equipment. Professional sellers are required to comply with legal warranty obligations. We advise you to always ask for warranty details before purchasing.
faq.q6: Can I have the equipment delivered?
faq.a6: Delivery is to be arranged directly with the seller. Some sellers offer transport services, others prefer hand delivery. Feel free to discuss the terms during your exchanges.
faq.q7: How do I report a fraudulent listing?
faq.a7: If you suspect fraud, use the "Report" button on each listing or contact our customer service. We treat each report with the utmost attention.
faq.a8: Payment is made directly between buyer and seller. We recommend using secure and traceable payment methods. Beware of unusual payment requests.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Our team is here to answer all your questions
contact.successDesc: We will respond as soon as possible.

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.section1Content: These Terms of Use define the terms and conditions of use of the EquipTrade platform, as well as the rights and obligations of users.
terms.section2Content: Access to the platform is free for buyers. Posting listings requires creating a seller account. The user agrees to provide accurate information and keep it up to date.
terms.section3Content: Sellers agree to publish accurate and non-misleading listings. Photos must accurately represent the equipment offered. Any fraudulent listing will be removed and may result in account suspension.
terms.section4Content: EquipTrade acts as an intermediary and cannot be held responsible for transactions made between users. Each user is responsible for verifying listing information and equipment quality.
terms.section5Content: All elements of the platform (logos, texts, images) are protected by intellectual property law. Any reproduction without authorization is prohibited.
terms.section6Content: EquipTrade reserves the right to modify these Terms at any time. Users will be informed of any substantial modification.
terms.section7Content: For any questions regarding these Terms, you can contact us at:

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section1Content: We collect data you provide when creating your account (name, email, phone) as well as data related to your listings and platform usage.
privacy.usage2: Enable contact between buyers and sellers
privacy.usage4: Send you communications regarding your account
privacy.section3Content: Your contact details (phone, email) are only visible to users who wish to contact you through a listing. We never sell your data to third parties.
privacy.section4Content: We implement technical and organizational measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, modification or destruction.
privacy.section5Content: Under GDPR, you have the following rights:
privacy.section6Content: Your data is kept for the duration of your registration and up to 3 years after account deletion, in accordance with our legal obligations.
privacy.section7Content: To exercise your rights or for any questions, contact our DPO at:

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.intro: Our site uses cookies to improve your browsing experience. This page explains what cookies are, how we use them and how to manage your preferences.
cookies.whatContent: A cookie is a small text file stored on your device when you visit a website. Cookies allow us to recognize your browser and remember your preferences.
cookies.necessaryDesc: These cookies are essential for the site to function. They enable navigation and access to basic features. They cannot be disabled.
cookies.analyticsDesc: These cookies help us understand how visitors use our site. They allow us to improve our platform and your user experience.
cookies.marketingDesc: These cookies are used to show you relevant ads. They also help measure the effectiveness of our advertising campaigns.
cookies.prefsSavedDesc: Your cookie preferences have been updated.
cookies.browserContent: You can also manage cookies directly from your browser settings. Check your browser's help to learn how to delete or block cookies.
cookies.contactContent: For any questions about our use of cookies, contact us at:
